data.actual_result: The avatar in chat is square shaped. Even after I restarted the app and my phone, it’s still that way.
data.expected_result: The avatar in chat is regular circle shape.
data.short_description: Your avatar is shaped square after you set your avatar to 1 x 1 pixels.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a 1 x 1 pixel image.- Observe the text chat
